put.description: Convert the margin product of an open position

This API allows you to modify an order. For modification orderId is mandatory. With orderId you need to send the optional parameter which needs to be modified. In case the optional parameters aren't sent, the default will be considered from the original order

400.description: UDAPI100010 - Unknown order id | order request rejected

post.description: This API allows you to place an order to the exchange via Upstox.

x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X 'POST' 
 'https://api.upstox.com/v2/order/place' 
 -H 'accept: application/json' 
 -H 'Api-Version: 2.0' 
 -H 'Content-Type: application/json' 
 -H 'Authorization: Bearer access_token' 
 -d '{
 "quantity": 1,
 "product": "D",
 "validity": "DAY",
 "price": 0,
 "tag": "string",
 "instrument_token": "NSE_EQ|INE848E01016",
 "order_type": "MARKET",
 "transaction_type": "BUY",
 "disclosed_quantity": 0,
 "trigger_price": 0,
 "is_amo": false
}'

post.description: This API provides the functionality to obtain opaque token from authorization_code exchange and also provides the userâ€™s profile in the same response.

400.description:
UDAPI1017 - API Key is required
UDAPI1018 - Redirect URI is required
UDAPI1022 - Code is required
UDAPI1023 - Grant type is required
UDAPI1024 - App Secret is required

get.description: This API allows to fetch the complete information of the user who is logged in including the products, order types and exchanges enabled for the user
Shows the balance of the user in equity and commodity market.

get.summary: Get profit and loss meta data on trades
get.description: This API gives the data of the realised Profit and Loss report requested by a user

parameters.name: from_date
parameters.description: Date from which data needs to be fetched. from_date and to_date should fall under the same financial year as mentioned in financial_year attribute. Date in dd-mm-yyyy format

parameters.name: to_date
parameters.description: Date till which data needs to be fetched. from_date and to_date should fall under the same financial year as mentioned in financial_year attribute. Date in dd-mm-yyyy format

parameters.name: segment
parameters.description: Segment for which data is requested can be from the following options EQ - Equity, FO - Futures and Options, COM - Commodity, CD - Currency Derivatives

parameters.name: financial_year
parameters.description: Financial year for which data has been requested. Concatenation of last 2 digits of from year and to year Sample:for 2021-2022, financial_year will be 2122

400.description:
UDAPI1070 - The financial_year is required
UDAPI1067 - The ''segment'' is required
UDAPI1066 - The ''segment'' is invalid
UDAPI1073 - Financial year should have max length of 4
UDAPI1068 - The start_date is required
UDAPI1069 - The end_date is required

get.summary: Get Trade-wise Profit and Loss Report Data
get.description: This API gives the data of the realised Profit and Loss report requested by a user

parameters.name: from_date
parameters.description: Date from which data needs to be fetched. from_date and to_date should fall under the same financial year as mentioned in financial_year attribute. Date in dd-mm-yyyy format

parameters.name: to_date
parameters.description: Date till which data needs to be fetched. from_date and to_date should fall under the same financial year as mentioned in financial_year attribute. Date in dd-mm-yyyy format

parameters.name: segment
parameters.description: Segment for which data is requested can be from the following options EQ - Equity, FO - Futures and Options, COM - Commodity, CD - Currency Derivatives

parameters.name: financial_year
parameters.description: Financial year for which data has been requested. Concatenation of last 2 digits of from year and to year Sample:for 2021-2022, financial_year will be 2122

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: Page Number, the pages are starting from 1

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Page size for pagination. The maximum page size value is obtained from P and L report metadata API.

400.description:
UDAPI1070 - The financial_year is required
UDAPI1071 - The page_number is required
UDAPI1072 - The page_size is required
UDAPI1067 - The ''segment'' is required
UDAPI1066 - The ''segment'' is invalid
UDAPI1073 - Financial year should have max length of 4

get.description: Fetches the current positions for the user for the current day.
Fetches the holdings which the user has bought/sold in previous trading sessions.
Retrieve the trades executed for an order

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: The order ID for which the order to get order trades

400.description:
UDAPI1010 - Order id accepts only alphanumeric characters and '-'.
UDAPI1023 - Order id is required
UDAPI100010 - Unknown order id | order request rejected

get.description: Retrieve the trades executed for the day

This API provides the list of orders placed by the user. The orders placed by the user is transient for a day and is cleared by the end of the trading session. This API returns all states of the orders, namely, open, pending, and filled ones.

This API provides the details of the particular order the user has placed. The orders placed by the user is transient for a day and are cleared by the end of the trading session. This API returns all states of the orders, namely, open, pending, and filled ones.

The order history can be requested either using order_id or tag.

If both the options are passed, the history of the order which precisely matches both the order_id and tag will be returned in the response.

If only the tag is passed, the history of all the associated orders which matches the tag will be shared in the response.

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: The order reference ID for which the order history is required

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: The unique tag of the order for which the order history is being requested

400.description:
UDAPI1010 - Order id accepts only alphanumeric characters and '-'
UDAPI1023 - Order id is required
UDAPI100010 - Unknown order id | order request rejected

get.description: This provides details on the login endpoint.

Get OHLC values for all instruments across various timeframes. Historical data can be fetched for the following durations.
1minute: last 1 month candles till endDate
30minute: last 1 year candles till endDate
day: last 1 year candles till endDate
week: last 10 year candles till endDate
month: last 10 year candles till endDate

400.description:
UDAPI1015 - to_date must be greater than or equal to from_date and Date should be in valid format: yyyy-mm-dd
UDAPI1020 - Interval accepts one of (1minute,30minute,day,week,month)
UDAPI1021 - Instrument key is of invalid format
UDAPI1022 - to_date is required
UDAPI100011 - Invalid Instrument key

delete.description:
Cancel order API can be used for two purposes:
Cancelling an open order which could be an AMO or a normal order
It is also used to EXIT a CO or OCO(bracket order)

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: The order ID for which the order must be cancelled

400.description:
UDAPI1010 - Order id accepts only alphanumeric characters and '-'.
UDAPI1023 - Order id is required
UDAPI100010 - Unknown order id | order request rejected
